title: Asparagus, Snow Pea, and Radish Salad

Ingredients.1: 0.25 pounds asparagus, trimmed and cut diagonally into 1-inch pieces

Ingredients.2: 0.5 pound snow peas, ends and strings removed, cut diagonally into 1-inch pieces

Ingredients.3: 15 small radishes, trimmed and thinly sliced

Ingredients.10: 3 tablespoons freshly squeezed lime juice, or more to taste

Directions.1: Bring water to a boil in a saucepan. Add asparagus; boil for 1 minute. Add snow peas to asparagus, boil for 1 minute more. Drain and pat dry.

Directions.2: Transfer asparagus and snow peas to a large bowl. Add radishes, scallions, and dill; toss salad gently to combine.

Directions.3: Whisk oil, sugar, salt, and pepper together in a small bowl; pour over salad and toss to coat. Set aside at room temperature to allow flavors to blend; about 1 hour. Drizzle lime juice over salad; toss gently until combined.
